Posts.Content: You need to get another doctor and get tested to see if you have an infection. They put me on Tamsulosin which has helped with the urine flow and the number of trips to the rest room. Then after 90 days or so get another PSA.
Posts.Signature: PSA 0.5 10/9/2006 PSA 1.8 11/4/2010 PSA 4.1 10/22/2013 PSA 4.4 3/03/2014 PSA 5.9 10/8/2014 PSA 7.0 11/8/2014 Biopsy Gleason 3+3 Prostatic adenocarcinoma involving 2-mm focus of one core, negative for perineural invasion recommended AS PSA 5.1 3/31/2015 PSA 9.0 9/9/2015 PSA 10.5 11/9/2015 Biopsy 12/18/2015 Negative on samples tested recommend AS PSA 10.5 2/2/2016
Posts.Title: i have a question about prostrate issues
